title: Shekhar Home
overview: Set in 1990s Lonpur, Bengal, “Shekhar Home” combines suspense & comedy as eccentric Shekhar and his new housemate Jayavrat solve a variety of cases while interacting with a vibrant cast of characters in a charming, pre-technology era.

tv.episodeOverview: Iraboty's arrival in Lonpur sparks intrigue as she convinces Shekhar to investigate the 150-year-old Skhondokhata legend in Purulia, linked to recent deaths in the Bhaskar family. Shekhar suspects a deeper conspiracy.
